trans-unit.source: What is Azure Event Hubs?
trans-unit.target: What is Azure Event Hubs?

trans-unit.source: Overview of Azure Event Hubs.
trans-unit.target: Overview of Azure Event Hubs.

trans-unit.source: What is Azure Event Hubs?
trans-unit.target: What is Azure Event Hubs?

trans-unit.source: Azure Event Hubs is a highly scalable data ingress service that can ingest millions of events per second so that you can process and analyze the massive amounts of data produced by your connected devices and applications.
trans-unit.target: Azure Event Hubs is a highly scalable data ingress service that can ingest millions of events per second so that you can process and analyze the massive amounts of data produced by your connected devices and applications.

trans-unit.source: Event Hubs acts as the "front door" for an event pipeline, and once data is collected into an event hub, it can be transformed and stored using any real-time analytics provider or batching/storage adapters.
trans-unit.target: Event Hubs acts as the "front door" for an event pipeline, and once data is collected into an event hub, it can be transformed and stored using any real-time analytics provider or batching/storage adapters.

trans-unit.source: Event Hubs decouples the production of a stream of events from the consumption of those events, so that event consumers can access the events on their own schedule.
trans-unit.target: Event Hubs decouples the production of a stream of events from the consumption of those events, so that event consumers can access the events on their own schedule.

trans-unit.source: Event Hubs capabilities
trans-unit.target: Event Hubs capabilities

trans-unit.source: Event Hubs is an event processing service that provides event and telemetry ingress to the cloud at massive scale, with low latency and high reliability.
trans-unit.target: Event Hubs is an event processing service that provides event and telemetry ingress to the cloud at massive scale, with low latency and high reliability.

trans-unit.source: This service is especially useful for:
trans-unit.target: This service is especially useful for:

trans-unit.source: Application instrumentation
trans-unit.target: Application instrumentation

trans-unit.source: User experience or workflow processing
trans-unit.target: User experience or workflow processing

trans-unit.source: Internet of Things (IoT) scenarios
trans-unit.target: Internet of Things (IoT) scenarios

trans-unit.source: Some other key Event Hubs capabilities are behavior tracking in mobile apps, traffic information from web farms, in-game event capture in console games, or telemetry data collected from industrial machines or connected vehicles.
trans-unit.target: Some other key Event Hubs capabilities are behavior tracking in mobile apps, traffic information from web farms, in-game event capture in console games, or telemetry data collected from industrial machines or connected vehicles.

trans-unit.source: Unlike [Service Bus queues and topics](../service-bus/service-bus-messaging-overview.md), Event Hubs is focused on delivering messaging stream handling at scale.
trans-unit.target: Unlike [Service Bus queues and topics](../service-bus/service-bus-messaging-overview.md), Event Hubs is focused on delivering messaging stream handling at scale.

trans-unit.source: Event Hubs capabilities differ from topics in that they are strongly biased towards high throughput and event processing scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Event Hubs capabilities differ from topics in that they are strongly biased towards high throughput and event processing scenarios.

trans-unit.source: As a result, Event Hubs do not implement some of the messaging capabilities that are available for [topics](service-bus/fundamentals-service-bus-hybrid-solutions.md#topics).
trans-unit.target: As a result, Event Hubs do not implement some of the messaging capabilities that are available for [topics](service-bus/fundamentals-service-bus-hybrid-solutions.md#topics).

trans-unit.source: If you need those capabilities, topics remain the optimal choice.
trans-unit.target: If you need those capabilities, topics remain the optimal choice.
